sentences.en: a hairy chest
sentences.cn: 毛茸茸的胸部

sentences.en: a large wooden chest
sentences.cn: 一只大木箱

sentences.en: After more misses, they finally put two arrows into the lion's chest.
sentences.cn: 又射偏了几次之后,他们终于把两支箭射入了狮子的胸膛.

sentences.en: Breathe out and ease your knees in toward your chest.
sentences.cn: 呼气，膝部放松向胸部靠拢。

sentences.en: He bared his muscular, hairy chest for a women's magazine.
sentences.cn: 他为一本女性杂志秀出了他那肌肉发达、毛发浓密的性感胸部。

sentences.en: He crossed his arms over his chest.
sentences.cn: 他在胸前交叉双臂。

sentences.en: He needs morphine to deaden the pain in his chest.
sentences.cn: 他需要吗啡来缓解胸痛。

sentences.en: He poked a long bony finger in Billy's chest.
sentences.cn: 他用细长的手指捅了一下比利的胸口。

sentences.en: He started flailing around and hitting Vincent in the chest.
sentences.cn: 他的手臂开始胡乱挥舞起来，打在了文森特胸口上。

sentences.en: He was shot in the chest.
sentences.cn: 他胸部中弹。

sentences.en: Her heart was pounding in her chest.
sentences.cn: 她的心在胸口怦怦直跳。

sentences.en: His chest heaved, and he took a deep breath.
sentences.cn: 他的胸脯上下起伏，然后他深深地吸了口气。

sentences.en: I feel it's done me good to get it off my chest.
sentences.cn: 我感觉吐吐苦水对我有好处。

sentences.en: Meer folded his arms over his chest and turned his head away.
sentences.cn: 米尔双臂交叉在胸前，把头转到一边。

sentences.en: Never keep on exercising if you have even the slightest chest pain.
sentences.cn: 即使你只感到很轻微的胸部疼痛，也不要继续锻炼。

sentences.en: Pop crossed his arms over his chest and watched us.
sentences.cn: 波普叉着胳膊看着我们。

sentences.en: She broke free by thrusting her elbow into his chest.
sentences.cn: 她用肘猛击他的胸部，挣脱了出来。

sentences.en: She came at him, pounding her fists against his chest.
sentences.cn: 她冲向他，用拳头使劲打他的胸膛。

sentences.en: She touched the thick mat of sandy hair on his chest.
sentences.cn: 她摸着他那浓密的淡棕色胸毛。

sentences.en: The majority of men have hair on their chest.
sentences.cn: 大多数男子长有胸毛。

words.tran_cn: 胸部丰满的；胸部大的；骄傲的

phrases.tran_cn: 胸部x光片；胸腔X 光摄影
社区福利基金；公有基金
[口语]心中有事，郁积在心，有心事 play it (或 something) close to the (或 one's) chest [口语]把某事藏在心中，对某事保守秘密；对…小心谨慎

phrases.phrase: play (或 keep) one's cards close to one's chest
phrases.tran_cn: (非正式)极端谨慎地保守私密，对想法秘而不宣

trans.tran_en: the front part of your body between your neck and your stomach
